caption.p: ( a) Multiple alignments of NOD1 protein sequences from mouse (NM_172729.3), human (NM_006092.3), pig (NM_001114277.1), chicken (NM_001318438.1), zebrafish (XM_002665060.6), grouper (JX220894.1), grass carp (FJ937972.1), and mandarinfish (KY974318). ( b) Multiple alignments of NOD2 protein sequences from mouse (NM_145857.2), human (XM_017023536.1), zebrafish (NM_001328044.1), pig (NM_001105295.1), fugu (NM_001042448.1), rainbow (NM_001201555.1), grouper (JX220895.1), and mandarinfish (KY974317). Abbreviations: CARD: caspase recruitment domain, NACHT: nucleotide binding/oligomerization domain, LRR: leucine-rich repeats Asterisks represent identical amino acids, and The symbols “.” or “:” denote conservative substitutions
